dt: {bc}a place where animals are kept and trained especially for exhibition
{bc}a collection of wild or foreign animals kept especially for exhibition

dt.t: A {wi}menagerie{/wi} of grotesque statues stood in the garden.

et: French {it}ménagerie{/it}, from Middle French, management of a household or farm, from {it}menage{/it}
shortdef: a place where animals are kept and trained especially for exhibition
a collection of wild or foreign animals kept especially for exhibition
